sql-select.name: GetInstanceNetworkStatusMonth
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m', hINS.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m', hINS.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,date(MIN(hINS.[EventDay]),'start of month') AS [EventDayMin] ,date(MIN(hINS.[EventDay]),'start of month','+1 month','-1 day') AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatus] hINS INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hINS.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE hINS.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(hINS.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatus] hINS INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hINS.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m', hINS.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m', hINS.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceNetworkStatusDays
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m%d', hINS.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m%d', hINS.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,CASE WHEN (strftime('%w', hINS.[EventDay]) = '0') THEN '#CC0000' ELSE '#080808' END AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,MIN(hINS.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMin] ,MAX(hINS.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatus] hINS INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hINS.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE hINS.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m%d', hINS.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m%d', hINS.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceNetworkStatus
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT hINS.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,hINS.[net_transport] AS [net_transport] ,CASE WHEN (hINS.[bytes_reads] > hINS.[bytes_reads_last]) THEN CAST((hINS.[bytes_reads] - hINS.[bytes_reads_last]) AS [REAL]) / CAST((strftime('%s', hINS.[EventTime]) - strftime('%s', hINS.[EventTimeLast])) AS [REAL]) ELSE 0.0 END AS [bytes_reads_second] ,CASE WHEN (hINS.[bytes_writes] > hINS.[bytes_writes_last]) THEN CAST((hINS.[bytes_writes] - hINS.[bytes_writes_last]) AS [REAL]) / CAST((strftime('%s', hINS.[EventTime]) - strftime('%s', hINS.[EventTimeLast])) AS [REAL]) ELSE 0.0 END AS [bytes_writes_second] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatus] hINS INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hINS.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE CASE WHEN ((@EventDayMin IS NOT NULL) AND (@EventDayMax IS NOT NULL)) THEN hINS.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) WHEN (@strDateTimeModifier IS NOT NULL) THEN hINS.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(hINS.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatus] hINS INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hINS.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) ELSE hINS.[EventDay] = date('1900-01-01') END ORDER BY hINS.[EventTime] ASC ;
